description: This file defines a React component for a UI sheet (drawer) using Radix UI primitives, with styling and composition for overlay, header, footer, title, description, and close button.

methods.name: SheetOverlay
methods.description: A React component that renders an overlay for the sheet, with animated fade-in and fade-out effects.

methods.name: SheetContent
methods.description: A React component that renders the main content of the sheet, including header, footer, and close button, with slide-in/out animations based on side position.

methods.name: SheetHeader
methods.description: A React component for the header section of the sheet.

methods.name: SheetFooter
methods.description: A React component for the footer section of the sheet.

methods.name: SheetTitle
methods.description: A React component for the sheet's title.

methods.name: SheetDescription
methods.description: A React component for the sheet's description.
